title: Why is your matchmaking stacking the deck against me???
body: Every game Ive had today has seen both other lanes feed, its not fair anymore, are we led to believe that every match has a 50/50 chance to win? Because that is bogus, why are you matching hard working players like me against smurfs and people who deliberately tank their MMR to get matched with trashies?

replies.body:
>  Because that is bogus, why are you matching hard working players like me against smurfs and people who deliberately tank their MMR to get matched with trashiee?

ha because AP yi is still viable in gold and it's hilarious
